snippet: In a statement, Cardinal Timothy M. Dolan and others will say they fear that “it is becoming increasingly difficult for the working poor of our state to make ends meet.”
abstract: Cardinal Timothy M Dolan and New York State's bishops call on the Legislature to increase the minimum wage, adding support to a proposal that has divided lawmakers along party lines.
lead_paragraph: In a statement, Cardinal Timothy M. Dolan and others will say they fear that “it is becoming increasingly difficult for the working poor of our state to make ends meet.”

headline.seo: Cardinal Dolan Seeks Higher Minimum Wage in New York
headline.main: Dolan and Bishops Urge Albany to Raise Minimum Wage
headline.print_headline: Dolan and Bishops Urge State To Raise the Minimum Wage
